name: Lemon Quest 2.0
description:
This is a game about a hero who after getting rid of the first lemon in Lemon Quest has been stuck with a new lemon friend in the second game in the lemon quest series. Our hero has decided to get rid of the lemon once and for all by defeating death itself. Play through a large amount of progressively harder stages and discover why you should never take any lemons life gives you.

Big shout out to Alex VS Coding for making this all possible.

Play the first Lemon Quest here: http://www.stencyl.com/game/play/20524
